meetings.topic: Bad Things Happen - Recognizing the Common Pitfalls in Java Concurrency Programming
meetings.abstract: This presentation is about recognizing common mistakes and misunderstandings with concurrency programming on the Java platform.

speaker.name: Marco Villalobos, LAJUG President
speaker.information: Marco Villalobos is a Software Engineer, and the Los Angeles Java Users' Group President.

meetings.location: Ticketmaster, 7060 Hollywood Blvd, 3rd Floor, Hollywood, CA, 90028
